definition: a man who has been castrated and is incapable of reproduction, to remove the ovaries of
details:
noun
- a man who has been castrated and is incapable of reproduction
= synonyms: eunuch
verb
- to remove the ovaries of
= synonyms: neuter
- to remove the testicles of a male animal
= synonyms: emasculate
- to edit by omitting or modifying parts considered indelicate
= synonyms: bowdlerize, bowdlerise, expurgate, shorten
- to deprive of strength or vigor
= synonyms: emasculate
